com.facebook.buck.parser

Interface BuildTargetParsePipeline<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of node this pipeline will produce (raw nodes, target nodes, etc)
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildTargetRawNodeParsePipeline

    public interface BuildTargetParsePipeline<T>
extends AutoCloseable
    Abstract node parsing pipeline. Allows implementors to define their own logic for creating nodes of type T.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getNode

        default T getNode(Cell cell,
                  UnconfiguredBuildTarget buildTarget)
           throws BuildFileParseException,
                  BuildTargetException
        Obtain a TargetNode. This may block if the node is not cached.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Cell that the BuildTarget belongs to.
        buildTarget - name of the node we're looking for. The build file path is derived from it.
        Returns:
        the node
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException - for syntax errors in the build file.
        BuildTargetException - if the buildTarget is malformed

      • getNodeJob

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> getNodeJob(Cell cell,
                                                                 UnconfiguredBuildTarget buildTarget)
                                                          throws BuildTargetException
        Asynchronously get the TargetNode. This leverages the cache.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Cell that the build file belongs to.
        buildTarget - name of the node we're looking for. The build file path is derived from it.
        Returns:
        future.
        Throws:
        BuildTargetException - when the buildTarget is malformed.
